title: Kaguya-sama’s Matchmaking Charm
description:
Kaguya Shinomiya and Miyuki Shirogane are the vice president and president of the student council, respectively. While they love each other, their pride prevents them from actually confessing on their own - and as such, they each try to make the other fall in love with them. 

One day, Kaguya’s maid gives her a “lucky charm” which will all but assure that Shirogane will profess his love for her. But unbeknownst to her, it’s actually a...

related.title: Kaguya-sama wa Kokurasetai: Tensai-tachi no Renai Zunousen
